markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Intuitive Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=2478) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aphorite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=335" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 76 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your affinity with process and order makes you a natural artisan. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) (or another skill of your choice, if you're already trained in Crafting). You gain the [Specialty Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=844) skill feat in a specialty of your choice.
name: Intuitive Crafting
